description:
Comics is like an RSS reader for webcomics. You can read a selection of your favorite comics directly on your device. The list of available comics includes publications such as Garfield, Dilbert, xkcd and many more, as well as some of the cheezburger network sites, like ICanHasCheezburger and Fail Blog. The list of supported webcomics will be refreshed automatically, without you having to update the app.
Tap the header to change the current comic, open the Configure screen to pick your own favorite comics list and tap the zoom button or double tap a comic to view it in fullscreen.
Tap the 'Share' button to share a funny comic via Email, Text message, Facebook or Twitter!
